text: What a terribly written article. No digging into why Trump is being labeled as fascist, just listing the accusations and Republican responses to those accusations. Lazy journalism with a naked agenda.
Yep. Her comments were so much more thoughtful than that. Also she didn’t use the words “nazi rally”
I feel like slavery and indigenous genocide might rank a little higher.

This is what they always do. Fuck the media for giving us Trump in the first place. I will never forgive or forget the way in which they co-opted an absolute insane person and made him palatable by repeating him ad-nauseam on cable tv.
Hillary's husband received the DNC presidential nomination at Madison Square Garden in 1992.
I am going to this event Saturday. Can you give me an idea of how long the speaking portion is?
In Chicago, the speaking portion began around 7:20 and ended around 9:05.
